diversity_policy: Select pool as union of: K_best + K_bridge + K_offbeat + K_low_curve per need bucket. No popularity sorting.
hard_caps: Per need bucket: max_candidates = K_best+K_bridge+K_offbeat+K_low_curve; Global per build: max_unique_candidates=900.
notes: K values are per Need_Buckets_v1_13. 'Offbeat' uses primitive-rarity-in-deck (not EDHREC).
pruning_order: 1) legality/color/bracket hard filters -> 2) required primitives/facets -> 3) profile hard caps (mv/curve) -> 4) remove direct anti-signals -> 5) score
tie_breakers: Deterministic tie break: (role_compression desc, curve_fit desc, overlap_with_primary_motifs desc, oracle_id asc).
why_it_matters: Preserves niche glue cards while keeping search bounded.
